posts.post_content: Looking for any in the $20-30 range..

Here's a list with prices:

McGinley, Piedmont, SGC 20, $25
Owen, Piedmont SGC 20, $25
Pelty, SC 460/42 OP, SGC 20, $27
Quillen, Piedmont, SGC A [looks Ex, but presumably trimmed], $23
Shaw, Piedmont SGC 20, $25

List has been edited to reflect availability.

Add $3 S/H for individual cards.

You can have the Lot for $120 delivered.  That would be ppff; regular PayPal add $5.

Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] if interested.

Thanks.

Doug
